summary: In FY 2022, federal agencies made an estimated $247 billion in payment errors—payments that either should not have been made or were made in the incorrect amount. Programs with estimated overpayments of at least $100 million receive additional review. This Q&A report—the third in a series of quarterly reports—examines this process and more. The Office of Management and Budget collects information on such programs with...
title: Improper Payments: Opportunities for Interagency Collaboration and Improvements
